channel.title: [525]quest tab.help pl0xxxxx[525]
channel.description:
on my 525 server,on the quest tab it shows all the quests.i dont want that there.i want it to be my own text...
E.G. "Owner: blah" and all that.
please help..

item.title: [525]quest tab.help pl0xxxxx[525]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“davidi2, post:2, topic:306111”] setString(p, "", 274, 5); setString(p, "SERVER NAME:", 274, 6); setString(p, "Owner: OWNER NAME", 274, 7); setString(p, "Player Rights: " + p.rights, 274, 8); setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 9); setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 10); setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 11); setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 12); for(int i = 0; i < 137; i++) { setString(p, "!~_-_~_-_~!", 274, 13+i); }
Put this in frames.java. Search for: setInterfaces(Player p)[/quote]Can’t it be done in login.java also?

Read full topic

item.title: [525]quest tab.help pl0xxxxx[525]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

setString(p, "", 274, 5);
setString(p, "SERVER NAME:", 274, 6);
setString(p, "Owner: OWNER NAME", 274, 7);
setString(p, "Player Rights: " + p.rights, 274, 8);
setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 9);
setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 10);
setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 11);
setString(p, "MORE INFO:", 274, 12);
for(int i = 0; i < 137; i++)
{
setString(p, "!~_-_~_-_~!", 274, 13+i);
}

Put this in frames.java. Search for: setInterfaces(Player p)

Read full topic
